channel.title: Small town life, elevated on Blist Multilingual Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Small town life, elevated on Blist Multilingual Theme

item.title: Villnöß with the Dolomites in the background, South Tyrol, Italy (© Achim Thomae/Getty Images)
item.description: 图文来源自：bing. copyright: © Achim Thomae/Getty Images You are in luck if you are looking for a peaceful escape from everyday life in an enchanted valley. Today’s image features Val di Funes in the Dolomites, Italy. Running from the Isarco Valley to the heart of Puez-Odle Natural Park, the valley offers a spectacular view of the surrounding mountains. With a large selection of hiking paths, such as the Adolf Munkel Trail, it is also an ideal destination for hikers.
